CustomField.formula: (5 * ( FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE(Approved_Date_Time__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( DATEVALUE(Approved_Date_Time__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.label: Time From Approved Until Today
